Pesan Jokowi ke Kapolri Idham Azis: Kerja, Kerja, Kerja
01 Nov 2019, 11:33 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Jenderal Idham Azis bersyukur dipercaya dan mendapat amanah menjadi Kapolri. Jenderal Idham menyebut Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) berpesan agar dirinya kerja, kerja, kerja.
"Bapak Presiden memberikan menyampaikan kepada saya, kerja, kerja, dan kerja," kata Idham Azis di kompleks Istana, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Idham, yang baru saja dilantik sebagai Kapolri di Istana, menyampaikan terima kasih kepada Presiden Jokowi. Idham menegaskan akan bekerja untuk menjalankan amanah.
"Saya juga mengucapkan terima kasih kepada Bapak Presiden Jokowi yang telah mempercayakan kepada saya untuk menjalankan tugas ini selaku Kapolri. Saya akan meningkatkan dan melanjutkan pemantapan kerja sama bersama TNI untuk bersama-sama menjaga keamanan," sambungnya.
Soal program Polri, Idham menegaskan tugas yang akan dikerjakan sudah dipaparkan saat fit and proper test di DPR. Sertijab dari Kapolri sebelumnya Tito Karnavian ke Idham Azis dijadwalkan digelar pada Rabu, 6 November.

Jokowi's message to the National Police Chief Idham Azis: Work, Work, Work
Nov 1, 2019, 11:33 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - General Idham Azis is grateful to be trusted and has the mandate to become the National Police Chief. General Idham said President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) advised him to work, work, work.
"Mr. President gave to convey to me, work, work and work," said Idham Azis at the Palace complex, Friday (11/01/2019).
Idham, who had just been installed as National Police Chief at the Palace, expressed his gratitude to President Jokowi. Idham insisted it would work to carry out the mandate.
"I also thank Mr. Jokowi who has entrusted me to carry out this task as the National Police Chief. I will improve and continue to strengthen cooperation with the TNI to jointly maintain security," he continued.
Regarding the Polri program, Idham emphasized that the work to be carried out had been presented during the fit and proper test at the DPR. The previous National Police Chief of Staff's Tti Karnavian to Idham Azis was scheduled to be held on Wednesday, November 6.
